name: babble
others_no_arg: $n babbles endlessly, won't $e EVER shut up?
actor_found_target: You babble to $N for hours on end.
others_found: $n babbles to $N for what seems an eternity, how can $N stand it?
target_found: $n babbles at you. You nod mechanically, hoping $e will shut up soon.
actor_auto: Whom do you wish to annoy with your babble?
